title: I just lost a game because my adc was in the jg farming at full build LOL
body: Getting red buff I can understand but no she was farming birds at full build (THIS IS PLAT ELO), she got caught doing so and died which destroyed our only chance of winning, we even had baron. HAHA OK NICE

replies.body: one unfortunate side effect of the grade system is that people feel the need to cs like mad from beginning to end of the game to get their S.
